title: Tiger Salad
source: A Very Chinese Cookbook - Kevin Pang
categories: A Very Chinese Cookbook - Kevin Pang
ingredients: - 1 Thai chile, stemmed, halved, seeded, and sliced thin
- 3 1/2 cups fresh cilantro leaves and tender stems, chopped into 2-inch lengths
- 4 celery ribs, sliced on bias 1/4 inch thick
- 1 serrano chile, stemmed, quartered, seeded, and sliced thin
directions: 1. In small bowl, stir vinegar, sugar, salt, and soy sauce until sugar and salt are completely dissolved. Add oil and Thai chile and stir to combine.

2. In large bowl, combine cilantro, celery, scallions, and serrano. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and dressing and toss to combine. Transfer salad to platter, sprinkle with peanuts, and serve immediately.
